Uses of Class
game.Sprite

  • Uses of Sprite in game

    Subclasses of Sprite in game
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Bullet
    Bullet class to create the sprite of a bullet being fired by Pacman.
    class 
    Diagonal_Ghost
    Diagonal Ghost class that creates a ghost enemy that bounces around the screen.
    class 
    Left_Ghost
    Left Ghost class that creates the ghost enemy that moves from right to left.
    class 
    Pacman
    Pacman class to keep track of the player character.
